name: The API library call GXM7WRS485.DLL
short_description:
This library (the DLL), to work with an absolute encoder Baumer GXM7W-RS485 (intelligent speed sensor) on the RS-485 network through physical or virtual COM port over USB in OS NT/2000/2003/XP/Vista/7/8 is designed to query, reading and decoding of data on traffic and the room pitch (angle) c 4 encoders on the same line. Poll encoders automatically.

1. You can optionally set the COM port in the procedure 'reinit ()' with a raised flag constantly activated, this is handled in the library. 
2. Parameter gl_count procedure 'getdata' indicates the number of received data packets from COM-port, regardless of the CRC. 
3. Receive data is the coincidence of the checksum in the received data packet and checksum calculated according to package a mismatch function returns the text 'CRC invalid.'. 
4. Address encoder [2 ... 5] is given by a combination of physically braces to the ground pins 4 and 6 plug DIN EN 61000-6-2
summary: This library to work with an absolute encoder Baumer GXM7W-RS485
